Description: Project requirement is to have Two Consultants sharing the below responsibilities:-    The TSCM consultant will conduct and provide training on TSCM equipment and surveys to detect, deter, and neutralize technical penetrations.-    Conducts comprehensive Basic and Advanced TSCM Training courses.-    Drafts comprehensive weekly reports that detail the TSCM training process and evaluations to project manager.-    Responsible for all TSCM equipment provided to client.-    Hands on Experience on Several TSCM Equipment (RF Signal Search – Line Analyzer – GSM identifier and locater - portable X-Ray – Mobile Spyware Detection).-    Provides proper recommendations for countermeasures to mitigate technical hazards and vulnerabilities.-    Performs an intense practice on TSCM equipment, and Offensive Techniques (Bugging).-    Providing subject matter mentoring on daily basis to client.-    Assisting in planning of sweep operations.-    Closely partners with trainees and team members in practical tests and implementations.-    Maintains knowledge of emerging technical threats and capabilities.-    Provides procurement support.-    Liaising, preparing, arranging, coordinating, managing and orienting with external training providers to develop course provision.-    Liaising, preparing, arranging, coordinating, managing and orienting with source manufactures for any technical support needed.-    Liaising, preparing, arranging, coordinating, managing and orienting with source manufactures for overseas expos and manufactures visits.Skills
Skills: -    Certification from the TSCM Fundamental Course or equivalent.
-    Instructor experience at a training center is desired.
-    Possess at least ten (10) years of experience and demonstrated subject matter expertise in technical surveillance countermeasures (TSCM), with a minimum of 4 years as a team lead.
-    Extensive experience with the deployment and maintenance of security telephony systems, planning of sweep operations and Offensive Techniques.
-    Demonstrates excellent communications skills, including written and oral presentations.
-    Strong, detail-oriented analytical and critical thinking skills.
